mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_order_flow ( order_no, cust_no, biz_type, pay_type, organ_id, order_date, order_time, trans_amt, order_state, remark ) VALUES ( #{prepay_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cust_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{biz_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pay_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organ_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_date(), current_time(), #{pay_amount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, '2', '诺宝充值' )
